artist: Paul Storr; Manufacturer: Sheffield Plate, stand
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Clarence O. Tormoen
inscription:
Marks; Inscription

An unidentified coat of arms in plumed mantling is engraved on either side of each cover, and an unidentified crest on the side of each dish.
life_date: Paul Storr, English, 1771â€“1844; Sheffield Plate, stand, Manufacturer
markings:
Marks

Each dish fully marked on side.  Maker's mark, date letter, and lion passant inside each cover.  Maker's mark, lion passant, and sovereign's head on underside of each finial.  .1:2 stamped on cover and dish. .2: 3 stamped on cover, 4 stamped on dish.
title: Breakfast dish and warmer
